description: Thresholds for calculating emergent social class based on wealth and income
note: Class is recalculated every N cycles for performance

lower.description: Workers with little to no savings

capitalRatioThresholds.description: Ratio of capital income to total income (0.0 - 1.0)
capitalRatioThresholds.note: Higher ratio means more income from ownership vs labor

skillIncomeThresholds.description: Alternative path to class via high skill income (gold per cycle)
skillIncomeThresholds.note: Skilled workers can reach upper/middle class without capital

elite.description: Must have both high wealth AND high capital income ratio

upper.description: Can achieve through wealth, capital ratio, OR high skill income

middle.description: Can achieve through modest wealth, some ownership, OR decent income

lower.description: Anyone not meeting middle class thresholds

upwardMobility.description: Must maintain threshold for N cycles before class upgrade

downwardMobility.description: Grace period of N cycles before class downgrade
